title: Asian stocks track Wall Street's drop, erasing previous day's gains
description: MANILA, Nov 21: Asian stocks on Friday tracked Wall Street’s sharp drop in skittish trading, with the region’s major benchmarks erasing the previous day’s gains. US futures were higher, while oil prices declined. Japan’s Nikkei 225 fell 2.4 per cent to 48,645.95 as worries persist about a bubble in artificial intelligence-related shares. Better-than-expected US jobs data also raised the likelihood that the Federal Reserve will hold off on an interest rate cut in December. Investors were awaiting the announcement of […]
content:

title: UAE to invest up to $50 billion in Canada in industries such as AI, energy
description: The United Arab Emirates will invest up to 50 billion dollars in Canada. This investment will focus on artificial intelligence, energy, and mining sectors. The UAE is expanding its energy investments abroad. Abu Dhabi is also heavily investing in AI. This framework was signed during a visit by Canada's Prime Minister to Abu Dhabi.
content:

title: Delhi to equip schools with AI learning in next 5 years: Ashish Sood
description: The Delhi government has announced a five-year plan to modernise all its schools with artificial intelligence-based learning tools and redesigned classrooms. The initiative has been launched alongside new CSR-supported programmes to strengthen public education.
content:
The Delhi government has set an ambitious five-year target to equip all its schools with artificial intelligence-enabled learning systems and modernised classrooms, Education Minister Ashish Sood said on Thursday.
The announcement came during a schoo... [2484 chars]

title: The Architecture of Intelligence: Building Trustworthy Systems in the Age of AI
description: As artificial intelligence reshapes industries, one truth is becoming clear: the next age of progress will not be defined by who has the most data or the fastest models, but by who builds the most trustworthy systems. title: AI Can Create Jobs If Leaders Prepare Workers, Jokowi Says
description: Former Indonesian President Joko Widodo said the promise of a coming “intelligent economy” will hinge on training populations in artificial intelligence and rethinking the systems of global institutions such as the World Bank and the World Trade Organization.

title: Foxconn, OpenAI Partner on AI Hardware Manufacturing
description: Foxconn will collaborate with US-based OpenAI to design and engineer data centre racks, components, and other artificial intelligence hardware.
